data.name: Lizard Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
My lizard is the Lizard of Soundtrack


This is the complete soundtrack for the game Lizard.

You can also access the soundtrack in the game by pressing SELECT on the title screen.

Track listing:

  • 1. Ruins (02:25)
  • 2. Maze (02:18)
  • 3. Marsh (02:57)
  • 4. Forest (02:08)
  • 5. Palace (01:41)
  • 6. Lava (02:21)
  • 7. Water (02:13)
  • 8. Lounge (01:13)
  • 9. Roots (02:15)
  • 10. River (02:28)
  • 11. Steam (03:33)
  • 12. Void (01:54)
  • 13. Mountain (02:17)
  • 14. Volcano (02:49)
  • 15. Sanctuary (01:03)
  • 16. Boss (02:05)
  • 17. Ending (02:19)
  • 18. Death (00:52)

All tracks encoded as MP3 V0.
Approximate size on disk: 82 MB
Approximate download size: 66 MB

The downloaded files can be found in the application's "local files" (see properties).

For more information please visit the website.
